report.title: UKBMS Visit Summary list
report.description: A list of the number of sites and visits recorded for each species, with filters for date start and end.
report.query: select tpref.taxon, count(distinct p.id) num_visits, count(distinct l.id) num_sites from taxa_taxon_lists ttl JOIN occurrences o ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND o.deleted = false AND #website_filter# JOIN samples s ON o.sample_id=s.id and s.deleted=false JOIN samples p ON s.parent_id = p.id AND p.deleted = false AND (CAST(p.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR p.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#',extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR p.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#',extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-12-31') as date)) JOIN locations l ON p.location_id = l.id AND l.deleted = false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttlpref ON ttlpref.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlpref.preferred='t' AND ttlpref.deleted=false JOIN taxa tpref ON tpref.id=ttlpref.taxon_id AND tpref.deleted=false JOIN (sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.id=sav.sample_attribute_id AND sa.deleted=false AND sa.caption='CMS User ID' ) ON sav.sample_id=p.id AND sav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE ttl.deleted = false AND (CAST(sav.int_value AS character varying)='#user_id#' OR '#user_id#' = '') GROUP by tpref.taxon #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the CMS user
